com.n9mtq4.logwindow.managers

Class PluginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.n9mtq4.logwindow.managers.PluginManager

  • public class PluginManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Will on 10/26/14.
    Handles all the loading from plugin jar files into the BaseConsole.
    Since:
    v4.0

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_PLUGIN_FOLDER

      • loadPluginListeners

        public static java.util.ArrayList<ListenerContainer> loadPluginListeners(java.io.File f,
                                                                         BaseConsole c)
        Loads a plugin from File f into BaseConsole c.
        This plugin being loaded must be in the new format with a plugin.txt in the root of the jar file.
        Parameters:
        f - The File
        c - The BaseConsole
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all the ListenerContainers that have been added.
